parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions "#echipa Valeriu Iftime,"  strongly suggesting an endorsement of a political entity or candidate associated with Valeriu Iftime. While not explicitly naming a party, the context clearly points towards a political endorsement.  This satisfies Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The targeting data shows a broad geographical reach across multiple cities and counties in Romania. This satisfies Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The phrase "o soluție sănătoasă pentru viitorul județului nostru" ("a healthy solution for the future of our county") strongly suggests an intention to influence voters' choices in the upcoming parliamentary elections. The positive framing of "Valeriu Iftime's team" aims to promote their candidacy. This satisfies Article 36 (7) - c. The overall objective is to garner support for this political entity or candidate.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. The post lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic reporting. It presents a biased and overtly positive portrayal of "Valeriu Iftime's team," clearly aiming to persuade rather than inform in a neutral manner.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post goes beyond expressing a personal opinion; it actively promotes a specific political entity or candidate, exceeding the bounds of personal expression.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>949234727252215</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, a paid advertisement, explicitly promotes "Valeriu Iftime's team," presenting them in a positive light and suggesting they are a "healthy solution" for the future.  This is done without explicitly naming a party, but the context clearly indicates an electoral objective. The targeting data shows a wide geographical reach, indicating an attempt to influence a large number of voters.  While no CMF number is present, the clear endorsement of a political entity or candidate during the electoral period makes it highly likely to be considered electoral propaganda.  The post lacks journalistic objectivity, instead focusing on persuasive language to sway voters.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Valeriu Iftime (or associated political entity)</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>Vocea Dorohoi</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Vocea Dorohoi, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 949234727252215) care promovează, într-un mod evident pozitiv și persuasiv, echipa lui Valeriu Iftime, prezentându-i ca o „soluție sănătoasă” pentru viitorul județului, având ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea acestuia sau a entității politice asociate, fără a respecta prevederile legale privind încheierea campaniei electorale.  Conținutul reclamei, lipsit de obiectivitate jurnalistică, constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
